Functions
setParams
sub setParams

This method sets the parameters for get_client_token command.  This module uses `request` method of OxdClient module for sending request to oxd-server

Parameters
string $client_id

(Required) Client Id from Client registration

string $client_secret

(Required) Client Secret. Must be used together with ClientId.

string $op_host

(Required) Url that must points to a valid OpenID Connect Provider that supports client registration like Gluu Server.

string $op_discovery_path

(Optional) Path to discovery document

array $scope

(Optional) Scope

Returns

void

This module uses `getResponseObject` method of OxdClient module for getting response from oxd.

Example response from getResponseObject:

{ "status": "ok", "data": { "access_token": "7ec389c5-64f8-49a3-a80c-e3e16d134bcb", "expires_in": 299, "refresh_token": null, "scope": "openid" } }
